mapper.sql: id, vendor_id, vendor_name, vendor_status, vendor_resp_groups, ddmc_amount, jindie_amount, balance, op_status, sync, crearte_time, update_time
mapper.update:
UPDATE finance_bill_vendor_list
vendor_id = #{vendorId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
vendor_name = #{vendorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
vendor_status = #{vendorStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT},
vendor_resp_groups = #{vendorRespGroups,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ddmc_amount = #{ddmcAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
jindie_amount = #{jindieAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
balance = #{balance,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
op_status = #{opStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT},
sync = #{sync,jdbcType=BIGINT},
crearte_time = #{crearteTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
WHERE id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
